title: Bear Needs Help with a Snack Jar

content.en: Most bears are strong and dangerous. But some bears need help.
content.tw: 大部分的熊強壯而兇猛，但有時候也需要別人幫忙！

content.en: A two-year-old bear in a U.S. city needed help. His head was in a big plastic jar. He could not take the jar off. Aww … Poor bear!
content.tw: 有一頭兩歲的熊，牠的頭被卡在透明塑膠罐裡。牠沒辦法把罐子弄掉，需要幫忙！

content.en: Why was the bear's head in the jar? Nobody knows. Maybe the jar had some snacks in it. Maybe he ate the snacks.
content.tw: 我們不知道這頭熊為什麼會把頭卡在塑膠罐裡。可能是吃罐子裡的點心時卡住的！

content.en: The bear could drink some water. But he could not eat. He became very thin. He was about 32 kilograms. Most two-year-old bears are 68 kilograms!
content.tw: 牠可以喝水，但沒辦法吃東西。可憐的熊瘦到只剩下32公斤，比一般的熊瘦很多很多！

content.en: For eleven days, people saw this bear walking around. They called the city. City workers tried to find him. But he walked a lot. He walked about 80 kilometers in one week!
content.tw: 當地的居民看見熊到處走動，他們打給當地機構尋求幫助。但這頭熊很難找，因為牠一個星期可以走80公里！

content.en: Finally, the workers found the bear. They gave him medicine. It made him sleep. Then, they took the jar off of his head.
content.tw: 工作人員終於找到熊了！他們用藥物讓熊睡著後，把罐子從牠頭上摘下來。

content.en: The workers let the bear go. He needs to sleep all winter soon. But first, he needs to eat a lot!
content.tw: 拿下罐子後，這隻熊要馬上去大吃一頓，為冬眠做準備！

content.en: If you see an animal that needs help, call your city!
content.tw: 如果你看到需要幫助的動物，請打電話給你的城市！

vocabulary.preface: 還好有人幫了這頭熊一個大忙。

content.text:
1. take off 拿掉或者脫掉。
Why does your cat look so angry? 你的貓怎麼看起來很生氣?
I tried to take a piece of tape off her tail. 我想把她尾巴上的一片膠帶撕掉。
And she got upset? 她就不高興了?
Yeah. 對。

2. medicine 藥品。
I think you need some medicine for those scratches.
我覺得你那些抓傷需要擦一點藥。
No, I'm fine. 不用了，我還好。

3. poor 可憐的。
Poor cat. 可憐的貓。
She and I don't get along well.她跟我合不來。
Poor you! 你比較可憐。

4. thin 瘦的。
Where did you find her? 你在哪裡找到她的?
In the park two months ago. 在公園，兩個月之前。
She was so thin, only about 2 kilos! 她好瘦，只有兩公斤吧。

vocabulary.postscript: 今天的單字你可記住了? take off拿掉或者脫掉 medicine藥品 poor可憐的 thin瘦的

title: Belize Wins the World Cup for a Very Old Ballgame

content.en: The Maya people have lived in Central America for thousands of years. These smart people made many new things.
content.tw: 住在中美洲好幾千年的馬雅人十分聰明。他們發明了很多東西！

content.en: The Maya were the first to make rubber. They made rubber balls! They made a game with these balls.
content.tw: 馬雅人也是最早做出橡膠的人，也創造了橡膠球，而且發明橡膠球遊戲。

content.en: The ballgame is called "pok-ta-pok." Maybe it is the first ballgame played in teams! There are two teams. They use a heavy ball. It is three or four kilograms!
content.tw: 這個遊戲叫 "pok-ta-pok"，很可能是第一個分組對抗的球類遊戲！遊戲中用的球有三到四公斤那麼重！

content.en: The players have to keep the ball in the air. That's like volleyball. But they cannot hit the ball with their hands. They hit it with their hips!
content.tw: 選手要讓球保持在空中，像排球一樣！但他們不能用手，而是要用他們的臀部打球！

content.en: The players try to put the ball through a ring. That's like basketball. But the ring is very small! And remember: players cannot use their hands!
content.tw: 選手要像打籃球一樣，把球投進籃框。但籃框非常小，他們也不能用手托球！

content.en: Today, more and more Maya are playing pok-ta-pok. Central America, Mexico, and the U.S. have teams. And every two years, there is a Pok-ta-pok World Cup! Belize won the first three World Cups. Wow! Then Mexico won two. The 6th World Cup was this year. Seven countries played. Belize and Mexico played the last game! And, Belize won!
content.tw: 現在，有越來越多瑪雅人玩pok-ta-pok。墨西哥，美國、和中美洲各國都有球隊。每兩年就會舉辦一次pok-ta-pok世界盃，讓這些球隊一決勝負。貝里斯贏得了前三屆世界盃。哇！接著墨西哥贏得了兩屆。今年是第六屆世界盃。有七個國家參賽。貝里斯和墨西哥打到了最後一場比賽！而且，貝里斯贏了！

vocabulary.preface: 古老的馬雅文化可以追溯到西元前兩千年，他們也會玩球。

content.text:
1. volleyball 排球。
Hey, Nancy! Long time no see! 南西，好久不見! What have you been up to lately? 最近都在忙什麼?
I've been playing volleyball with some friends after work.我下班之後都跟朋友打排球。

2. ballgame 球類遊戲。
Really? I didn't know you liked ballgames.真的喔?我都不知道你喜歡玩球。
I thought you were more of a biker.我以為你比較愛騎車。

3. play 玩。
I was. 以前是。
But my office has this game night every Friday,但是我的公司每周五晚上是玩球日，
and they always play volleyball. 都是打排球。

4. keep 保持。
That's so cool! 真酷呢!
I tried it once but had trouble keeping it in the air.
我玩過一次但是很難維持球不掉下來。
